B:246-289 B:246-289 }}

'Formate dehydrogenases' are a set of enzymes that catalyse the oxidation of
formate to bicarbonate, donating the electrons to a second substrate, such as
NAD + in formate:NAD+ oxidoreductase (EC 1.2.1.2) or to a cytochrome
in formate:ferricytochrome-b1 oxidoreductase (EC 1.2.2.1).
